title: Why SARA?
text:
SARAINSTITUTE

   REGISTER NOW


Empowering underrepresented communities through purposeful education and research.
  

Why SARA?


Data Science: Empowering underrepresented communitiesthrough purposeful data science education.

Research: Empowering underrepresented communitiesthrough purposeful data science education.

English: Empowering underrepresented communitiesthrough purposeful data science education.




DIGITAL DREAMS

30 COMPUTERS.
30 STUDENTS.
30 DREAMS.




A Purposeful Institute

SARA was founded in 2023 for community-rooted data science education & research. Our mission is to enhance the representation of under-privileged communities in data science and mentor them to cultivate creativity and lead impactful lives.
 
More about SARA
